fields_of_interest: Education and training, Research and innovation, Digital economy and society
head_office_address: Department of Computer Science University College Cork
eu_initiatives: The European Association for Artificial Intelligence EurAI (formerly ECCAI) was established in July 1982 as a representative body for the European Artificial Intelligence community. Its aim is to promote the study, research and application of Artificial Intelligence in Europe.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: The European Association for Artificial Intelligence EurAI (formerly ECCAI) was established in July 1982 as a representative body for the European Artificial Intelligence community. Its aim is to promote the study, research and application of Artificial Intelligence in Europe.
relevant_communication:
EurAI has partnered with the European Commission on the mapping out the European Artificial Intelligence landscape. This was the subject of a workshop which we worked on with the European Commission, details of which can be found here: https://ec.europa.eu/digital-single-market/events/cf/the-european-ai-landscape/register.cfm?login=true 
 
The final report of this event was published as a report in April 2018. This report can be found here, which the involvement of EurAI is explicitly stated: european ai landscape report
